entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW LATE THIS EVENING, THEN SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION UP TO 1 INCH
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
TEMPERATURE RISING TO AROUND 40 AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
